subject: [junit] @Rule TestName not available in @Before methods...
msgSnippet: This is a shame, the framework indeed knows the test method for which @Before is executing. I haven t looked at the new rules impl yet, does anybody know if
messageBody:
This is a shame, the framework indeed knows the test method for which @Before
is executing.

I haven't looked at the new rules impl yet, does anybody know if its even
possible that TestName could be initialized before @Before methods?
--
